x: Maria had 10 stamps in her collection. After her birthday, she had a total of 28 stamps. How many stamps did she receive?
z: Maria had 10 stamps in her collection. After her birthday, she had a total of 28 stamps. So, she must have received 28 - 10 = 18 stamps as gifts for her birthday.
z_uninformative: Maria had some stamps. After her birthday, she had more stamps. Let's compute how many she received for her birthday.
